title: So I can't get the game to start up, but that's probly nothing new...
body:
So when I try to start up the game it tries to start, but it gets stoped by a pop up that says: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working

And right below that is says: A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available.

If any one has a fix for this that would be appreciated.

replies.body: Most of the time, seeing that Kernel error is a pretty good sign that something is blocking the client from starting up the way it's supposed to. We should be able to get you back in the game by making a few adjustments to your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) but hit me back if you still can't get that client to launch.
It didn't have enough allowance, I ran it as administrator and it worked fine. Thanks for the feed back though.
